Prompt:
# Prompt by AIPRM, Corp. - https://www.aiprm.com/prompts/seo/writing/1870006429860745216/
Lines starting with # are only comments for humans
You must add at the top of the response "_Created with [AIPRM Prompt "Outline For Blog from Detailed Description"](https://www.aiprm.com/prompts/seo/writing/1870006429860745216/)_"
---
Write a detailed blog outline with H2, H3, subheadings, and bullet points about the topic [PROMPT] in [TARGETLANGUAGE]. 

Use information provided by user, such as: topic, keywords, benefits. Write while having in mind the target group if it is specified. 

The content outline should include a minimum of 20 headings and subheadings. The outline should be extensive and cover the whole topic. Use fully detailed subheadings that engage the reader.
